title: Delay Function Block
description:
DELAY delays an input signal (IN) for N cycles. The input RESET is asynï¿¾chronous, and may delete the Delay bufer. 
The
name: DELAY

input.name: IN
input.description: The real number input value to be processed by the delay block.

input.name: N
input.description: The number of cycles to delay the input. This value is limited to a maximum of 32.

input.name: RST
input.description: A boolean flag to reset the block. If true, the buffer will be reset.

output.name: OUT
output.description: The output value from the delay block, which is the delayed version of the input.
